content.prompt: The author makes which of the following arguments in the excerpt about the perceptions Whites maintained regarding emancipated people in the North?

choices.label: They expected emancipated people to assimilate into society.
They believed that emancipated people were unable to take care of themselves.
They hoped that emancipated people would provide a source of inexpensive labor.
They assumed that emancipated people would advocate for abolition in the South.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
